programme.title: NHL Hockey Edmonton Oilers at Vegas Golden Knights
programme.sub-title: Edmonton Oilers at Vegas Golden Knights
programme.desc: The Golden Knights host the Oilers for Game 2 of their Western Conference semifinal series. Edmonton scored three times in the third period of Game 1 en route to a 4-2 victory. Oilers star Connor McDavid has 13 points in seven postseason contests.

programme.title: NHL Hockey Vegas Golden Knights at Edmonton Oilers
programme.sub-title: Vegas Golden Knights at Edmonton Oilers
programme.desc: The Golden Knights and Oilers shift their West semifinal to Canada for Game 3. After Vegas launched a comeback to force Game 2 to overtime, Edmonton captain Connor McDavid fed fellow star Leon Draisaitl for the 5-4 winner and a 2-0 series lead.

programme.title: NHL Hockey Vegas Golden Knights at Edmonton Oilers
programme.sub-title: Vegas Golden Knights at Edmonton Oilers
programme.desc: The Golden Knights aim to draw level with the Oilers in Game 4 of their West semifinal. Reilly Smith's wide-angle goal off Leon Draisaitl's stick with 0.4 seconds left on the clock stunned the Edmonton faithful in Game 3, giving Vegas a 4-3 victory.

programme.title: NHL Hockey Edmonton Oilers at Vegas Golden Knights
programme.sub-title: Edmonton Oilers at Vegas Golden Knights
programme.desc: The Oilers try to advance in Game 5 of their second-round series against the Golden Knights. Edmonton pushed Vegas to the brink by cruising to a 3-0 decision in Game 4. Edmonton seeks a third trip to the Western Conference finals in four seasons.
